name: Simple Dark Quora
description: Adds a mostly working dark theme for Quora. Please see 'known bugs' section! This is simpler than other available styles, as it does not add textures to the background, and it aims to keep much of Quora's current style (such as red 'flare')
additional_info: Updates: [v0.1] Released 9 June 2018: Initial release. Known bugs: Notifications currently do not work; the text is the same colour as the background. New people section & new topics section in feed also have the same issue.
